biotools.summary:
A mobile application for identification of rare lipodystrophy syndromes.

LIPO-DDx® is a mobile app based on a personal algorithm developed by Prof. David Araújo-Vilar. With the support of the University of Santiago de Compostela, the Galician Health Service (SERGAS) and AELIP (International Association of Relatives and People with Lipodystrophy).
